info.name: Restore YouTube Small Thumbnails and Trending page
info.description:
Allows you to restore and define the amount of columns present on the Home page (default: 6).
Allows you to restore the Trending page on two columns instead of one.
info.additionalInfo: 16/11/2019: Removes the YouTube Mixes/Trending section on Home page (can be brought back in CSS code).
